meaningMnemonic: Think about all the important places your <kanji>footwear</kanji> has touched, one place to the next in <kanji>continuation</kanji>, and <kanji>write</kanji> it all down. What you'd get is a <vocabulary>personal history</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>resume</vocabulary>. I guess you can think of it as a history of the schools and jobs you've left your footprints at.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
